de.unlixx.runpng.scene.settings

Class AbstractSettingsPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
              • de.unlixx.runpng.scene.settings.AbstractSettingsPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UndoListener, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractEffectPane, EffectsSettingsPane, FileSettingsPane, FloatGeneratorPane, FrameSettingsPane, ThumbnailPane

    public abstract class AbstractSettingsPane
extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
implements UndoListener
    AbstractSettingsPane derives from GridPane with some handy generic methods.

      • createPositiveIntegerTextField

        protected javafx.scene.control.TextField createPositiveIntegerTextField(int nDefault,
                                                                        int nPrefColumns,
                                                                        int nMin,
                                                                        int nMax,
                                                                        javafx.geometry.Pos alignment,
                                                                        java.lang.String strTooltipId,
                                                                        javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handler)
        Creates a TextField which allows only positive integer values.
        Parameters:
        nDefault - An int containing the start value.
        nPrefColumns - The number of preferred columns.
        nMin - An int containing the minimum value.
        nMax - An int containing the maximum value.
        alignment - A Pos enum type to position the number in the field.
        strTooltipId - A string with a localizable tooltip id.
        handler - An EventHandler for handling user actions.
        Returns:
        A TextField object.

      • createSlider

        protected javafx.scene.control.Slider createSlider(double dMin,
                                                   double dMax,
                                                   double dValue,
                                                   java.lang.String strTooltipId,
                                                   javafx.event.EventHandler<SliderEvent> handler)
        Creates a Slider object.
        Parameters:
        dMin - A double containing the minimum value.
        dMax - A double containing the maximum value.
        dValue - A double containing the initial value.
        strTooltipId - A string with a localizable tooltip id.
        handler - An EventHandler for handling user actions. In that case a special SliderEvent will be sent to the handler.
        Returns:
        A Slider object.

      • createIntegerSpinner

        protected javafx.scene.control.Spinner<java.lang.Integer> createIntegerSpinner(int nDefault,
                                                                               int nMin,
                                                                               int nMax,
                                                                               int nStepWidth,
                                                                               javafx.geometry.Pos alignment,
                                                                               java.lang.String strTooltipId,
                                                                               javafx.event.EventHandler<ValueEvent<java.lang.Integer>> handler)
        Creates an element of type Spinner for positive integer values.
        Parameters:
        nDefault - An int containing the start value.
        nMin - An int containing the minimum value.
        nMax - An int containing the maximum value.
        nStepWidth - The step width to increase or decrease the value if the user clicks an arrow button.
        alignment - A Pos enum type to position the number in the field.
        strTooltipId - A string with a localizable tooltip id.
        handler - An EventHandler for handling user actions.
        Returns:
        A Spinner object.

      • createImageButton

        protected javafx.scene.control.Button createImageButton(java.lang.String strId,
                                                        java.lang.String strTooltipId,
                                                        java.lang.String strImagePath,
                                                        javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handler)
        Creates a Button with an image from the app resurces.
        Parameters:
        strId - A string with an id. Just to identify.
        strTooltipId - A string with a localizable tooltip id.
        strImagePath - The image path in the resources (e. g. icons/32x32/file.open.png).
        handler - An EventHandler for handling user actions.
        Returns:
        A Button object.

      • createImageToggleButton

        protected javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton createImageToggleButton(java.lang.String strId,
                                                                    java.lang.String strTooltipId,
                                                                    java.lang.String strImagePath,
                                                                    javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handler)
        Creates a ToggleButton with an image from the app resurces.
        Parameters:
        strId - A string with an id. Just to identify.
        strTooltipId - A string with a localizable tooltip id.
        strImagePath - The image path in the resources directory (e. g. icons/32x32/dir.up.png).
        handler - An EventHandler for handling user actions.
        Returns:
        A ToggleButton object.

      • createColorPicker

        protected javafx.scene.control.ColorPicker createColorPicker(javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
                                                             java.lang.String strTooltipId,
                                                             javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handler)
        Creates a ColorPicker element.
        Parameters:

        handler - An EventHandler for handling user actions.
        Returns:
        A ColorPicker object.

      • reset

        public abstract void reset()
        This method will called in case the settings pane has to set it's values back to default. E. g. when the user clicks on file new.

      • appSizeChanged

        public abstract void appSizeChanged(int nAppWidth,
                                    int nAppHeight)
        This method will be called to inform the settings pane that the application image size has been changed.
        Parameters:
        nAppWidth - An int containing the new width.
        nAppHeight - An int containing the new height.

      • collectProject

        public abstract void collectProject(PngProject project)
        Called before a project file is written to collect all settings from the panes.
        Parameters:
        project - An object of type PngProject.

      • applyProject

        public abstract void applyProject(PngProject project)
        Called after a project file has been opened to apply the data to the settings pane.
        Parameters:
        project - An object of type PngProject.
